pages.text: These robes take the freely-gifted fey leather, certainly preferably to the skin of slain animals, and transform them into magical robes.$(br2)In addition to the protection they give, their magical nature also imparts onto the wearer and their possessions a boon: $(info) each piece worn decreases the costs of any spell or process that consumes herbs, starting at 2% and increasing to 8% when all four pieces are worn.
